text: i came to the mens club of charlotte with dj evo and some friends we had a great time leah was our bartender she was excellent and helpful with recommending some great drinks had a great time
love this place no matter how busy they are they always give great service
one of the topnotch selections savored the mouthwatering crab legs and shrimp yet it failed to match the excellence of the cosmopolitan

one of the female staff members had a poor attitude towards us and there were limited options for dining the taste of the food was just average and considering the service and quality the price seemed unjustified however i must admit that i was content with the cleanliness of everything

initially im not particularly fond of buffet dining however due to receiving a 50 credit for staying at the monte carlo in las vegas and my friends insistence i decided to give it a try the food had an acceptable taste but there was a lack of diverse options and the service left much to be desired despite this experience my opinion regarding buffets remains unchanged

although seafood isnt particularly my taste i decided to indulge in it for my husbands special day fortunately the restaurant had additional menu selections that brought me satisfaction and my husband happily declared how much he loved his food

statement 2 i had an unpleasant experience with the service and food at the restaurant to begin with my breakfast plate was covered in grease making it difficult to enjoy my meal additionally the egg was undercooked further adding to my disappointment the drinks werent any better especially the mimosa which was extremely unpalatable consequently i decided to return the mimosa and settle for a simple coffee
stir fry selection is great  they have everything from steak to fish to scallops  the only downfall is during dinner rush it can take a long time to have your food prepared

i like it enough to come back the grilled hawaiian sandwich is good but crispy borderline burnt tasting today their tuna salad is really yummy they are pretty skimpy on salad dressings and a few times ive had some wilty yuckiness in my field greens salad nice ambience though and good outdoor seating

the bagels are satisfactory but i find their beverages delicious the blackberry lemonade is a favorite of mine the ambiance is sterile but the air conditioning keeps it comfortable and the bathrooms are immaculate considering its location on state street thats quite impressive
with the exception of neglecting to reattach my antenna initially their efficiency in completing the job within 20 minutes is impressive

our dining experience tonight turned out to be a major disappointment due to the poorly cooked steaks at the steakhouse the only saving grace was the perfectly prepared crab dish which is certainly not what one would expect from a renowned restaurant specializing in steaks

every time i find myself in las vegas i constantly crave a visit to this destination for a latenight snack the food is satisfactory with generouslysized portions that are reasonably priced for a city like vegas the venue is also ideal for large groups and interestingly enough i believe it shares ownership with the famed cheesecake factory nonetheless what truly sets this place apart for me is its extensive selection of delectable meals including an impressive assortment of breakfast choices

on a wednesday evening when it wasnt particularly crowded i decided to try the medium traditional wings at a restaurant although they were tasty they were just average in terms of flavor the service was good but a bit slow although the staff did bring me extra ranch dressing for free which was nice considering many places charge extra one notable aspect of this place is the numerous tvs scattered around making it an ideal spot for watching sports games

lack of adequate staffing led to sluggish service at the busily populated store highlighting the need for additional employees on a positive note i received prompt assistance in honoring my car battery warranty taking me less than 5 minutes to gather everything necessary however due to a scarcity of workers it consumed an additional half an hour just for the simple task of replacing the battery

gathering at this establishment is a tradition for my family although i have yet to encounter a meal that i truly found enjoyable while the service is commendable i find myself consistently dissatisfied upon departure
with the exception of neglecting to reinstall my antenna which has happened once their service is commendable as they manage to finish the task swiftly in just 20 minutes

the 9stage system weve procured has won us over with its remarkable ability to stabilize the ph levels in our reverse osmosis water what truly amazes us is not just the excellent quality of this equipment at such reasonable prices but also the fact that it proudly bears the made in the usa label setting it apart from items originating in china

if youre tired of the same old sports clips or runofthemill barbershops its time to check out this hidden gem in charlotte the skilled barbers here not only know their way around any hairstyle but also inject a fun and lively atmosphere into the experience from precise shapeups to flawless fades and tapeups theyve got you covered

the beds are really cozy and the location is prime you also get complimentary wifi parking and access to a roundtheclock pool and hot tub furthermore the housekeepingsecurity team was able to locate the cell phone we forgot in the room i would absolutely consider returning
you wont be disappointed by the quality of the vegetarian dishes particularly the scrumptious spicy po boy and the irresistible chili fries
the crab legs and shrimp were enjoyable although they werent quite as excellent as the cosmopolitian

to start with let me clarify that im not exactly a big enthusiast of buffets however due to being granted a 50dollar credit as part of our stay at the monte carlo in las vegas and my friends eagerness i reluctantly decided to give it a chance as it turned out the taste of the food was decent enough but the lack of diversity in their offerings and the unsatisfactory service further reinforced my preexisting negative perception of buffets

the latest location that has caught my attention is at 1531 east blvd in charlotte nc here you can indulge in an extensive selection of more than 15 flavors of chicken salad alongside delectable desserts like hummingbird cake and cokeacola cake—a reminiscent taste of moms home cooking notably this place achieved worldwide recognition through its appearance on the renowned food network for serving their famous buttered and grilled chicken on a new england roll additionally they offer great value for these delightful offerings
im not a fan of seafood but it was my husbands birthday and he adores it there were alternative choices besides seafood that brought me joy and my husband expressed his delight with his meal

dryaged meats never appeal to our taste buds as they often have an unpleasant rotten flavor on the other hand the sides are satisfactory but theres nothing extraordinary that would justify praising or revisiting this place
one of the superior options relished the abundance of crab legs and shrimp although it fell short in comparison to the cosmopolitan
the vegetarian food is exceptional the spicy po boy and chili fries are both incredibly delicious
is the chick that matts holding worth waiting for
the vegetarian options served here are of exceptional quality the spicy po boy is incredibly satisfying and the chili fries are equally delightful
the service at that place is so terrible i will never set foot there again its similar to those locations where the quality of service is extremely disappointing

the dinner we had tonight was a disaster  every steak at our table was improperly cooked with the only redeeming factor being the correctly prepared crab thats certainly not what you expect from a steakhouse

to put it simply this particular kind of asian food exhibits a salty flavor profile with sauces and meat that can often taste like they come from a can its comparable to frozen meals available at supermarkets but comes with a higher price tag

the service provided was incredibly welcoming and we were astounded by how tasty the food turned out to be our choice of the gyro left us completely satisfied  it matched the standard of any other place weve tried despite arriving only five minutes before closing time the food maintained its freshness and didnt have any undesirable flavors the only minor setback was the lack of salad ingredients in the wrap this is certainly a place i would come back to enjoy a meal

had enough of the usual sports clips or runofthemill barbershops look no further let this exceptional establishment be your next destination the barbers here possess an impressive ability to artfully cut hair while providing a lively and enjoyable setting they specialize in precise shapeups impeccable fades and flawless tapeups finding this delightful place in charlotte has brought immense joy to my life

they offer delicious food at fairly reasonable prices typically averaging around 25 per person for dinner unfortunately their level of customer service and speediness is quite lacking often necessitating requests for additional drinks napkins or your check to make matters worse the person at the cash register actually had the audacity to inquire why i didnt leave a tip when the service was subpar

the quality of the food is excellent with an average dinner cost of around 25 per person however they lack a strong sense of customer service and efficiency often requiring you to ask for drink refills napkins and your bill surprisingly the guy at the register even questioned me about not leaving a tip despite the poor service provided
my time spent here is always filled with pleasant moments

the 9 stage system we opted for turned out to be the perfect solution for balancing the ph of our ro water not only did we manage to secure the best price possible for highquality equipment but we also appreciate the fact that it is manufactured in the us rather than in china
among the options available the crab legs and shrimp were relatively satisfying yet not on par with the cosmopolitian
its average at best without any noteworthy elements the selection of seafood is limited rendering it indistinguishable from the rest of the asian buffets in the area

looking for a change from the usual sports clips or generic barbershops discover this incredible barbershop in charlotte that offers expert haircuts with an entertaining twist the skilled barbers here excel at shapeups fades and tapeups its a real gem
with prices this cheapni expected bland sushinbut hey its pittsburgh

the bagels here are satisfactory however its the delightful beverages that steal the show my taste buds are especially fond of their blackberry lemonade as for the ambiance it may come across as lacking character yet it compensates with a refreshing airconditioned environment and impeccably maintained restrooms considering its location on state street this is quite impressive
the steakhouse we went to tonight served the worst dinner ever as every steak at our table was improperly cooked however the one shining spot was the crab which was prepared perfectly

the cost of food is remarkably reasonable averaging approximately 25 per person during dinnertime regrettably the restaurant falls short in terms of customer service and speediness it is often necessary to ask for extra drinks napkins or your bill interestingly the cashier himself questioned my decision not to give a tip implying that there was no merit in his service
what a great place  cindy is the best

get ready to be wowed by the brandnew establishment situated at 1531 east blvd in charlotte nc this exciting place boasts an impressive range of choices with over 15 mouthwatering variations of chicken salad awaiting you extend your culinary adventure and satisfy your sweet tooth by trying their irresistible desserts which include classics like hummingbird cake and cokeacola cake—each bite transportingly reminiscent of the comforting flavors our mothers used to lovingly create this unique eatery has even gained nationwide fame owing to its feature on the illustrious food network highlighting their worldfamous buttered and grilled chicken served on a new england roll moreover youll appreciate their excellent pricing making it accessible for everyone to enjoy these remarkable treats

one of the female staff members had a poor attitude towards us and there were limited options for dining the taste of the food was average and considering the quality the price did not match however i am content with the fact that everything was kept clean
dont eat here much anymore it seems they are always out of one or another items biscuits more than once and twice they were out of chicken its kfc how do you run out if chicken
this establishment never fails to provide me with satisfying encounters

the beds are incredibly comfy and the location is great plus they offer free wifi parking and a 247 open pool and hot tub on top of that when we accidentally left our cell phone in the room the housekeepingsecurity staff found it for us i would definitely go back

it was on a wednesday night that i made my way to a notsobusy restaurant at this establishment i decided to go for the medium traditional wings which turned out to be fairly enjoyable but nothing extraordinary the service provided was good overall despite being somewhat sluggish to my surprise i received complimentary extra ranch dressing which is usually subject to an additional charge at other places notably this venue boasts an impressive collection of around one hundred television screens making it an attractive destination for catching live sporting events
does the prolonged anticipation for matts highquality piglet justify me giving my approval and vouching for it

the rolls are tiny and not a good choice opt for the seabass appetizer instead

our experience was marred by the unfriendly behavior of one particular lady offering service and the restaurant only offered a few choices of meals the taste of the food left much to be desired and given the quality and service the price was far from worth it nonetheless i can say that i was pleased with how clean everything was
i have no intention of returning to that particular place because their service was so awful its reminiscent of those kinds of establishments where receiving satisfactory service is unlikely

my friends and i visited this dennys restaurant around 1130 pm everything seemed fine and the waiter was very friendly although i didnt eat anything my friends did and unfortunately they fell ill afterward

the prices for food are exceptionally affordable with an average of around 25 per person for dinner however the restaurant lacks a clear understanding of customer service and efficiency you may have to request drink refills napkins your bill and other basic amenities surprisingly when i didnt leave a tip the cashier asked me why i chose not to reward their inadequate service
this asian cuisine option offers a salty taste resembling canned sauces and meat which is somewhat similar in quality to frozen dinners found in grocery stores at a higher price point

the newly opened spot situated at 1531 east blvd in charlotte north carolina presents an array of choices when it comes to chicken salad boasting more than 15 distinct flavors indulge in their wide selection of mouthwatering sweets like the decadent hummingbird cake and the classic coke a cola cake the meals are crafted to evoke nostalgic memories of homecooked goodness  akin to those lovingly made by your own mother furthermore this establishment has gained global recognition through its featured appearance on the renowned food network showcasing their worldfamous chicken served on a buttered and grilled new england roll notably the prices offered here are highly competitive making it an even more appealing dining option
we went there last night what a waste the salads came out fine but we waited about 45 minutes for steak and asparagus how long does it take to grill a steak sorry but we wont be back
i will not go back to that establishment due to the extremely poor service it reminds me of those types of places where the quality of service is abysmal

mehthis bar whelms me  not over and not under  the bartenders are pretty friendly and the drinks are cheap  theres usually some drag show or karaoke going on when i stop in and thats  about it  the end
the food delivered from this restaurant was very close to in inedible a complete waste of money never again
we dont really prefer dryaged meats they tend to taste spoiled to us however the sides are decent with no exceptional flavors that would make us want to come back or recommend them

every occasion im in las vegas i am enticed to drop by this establishment for a latenight treat the food isnt too shabby portion sizes are massive and the pricing is surprisingly reasonable given the context of las vegas additionally it has ample space to cater to sizable parties and word on the street is that it shares ownership with the renowned cheesecake factory however what truly captivates me about this spot is the extensive selection of culinary delights including their commendable breakfast offerings

i find these bagels to be acceptable although the drinks they offer are quite delicious personally i particularly enjoy their blackberry lemonade in terms of the atmosphere it may seem sterile but it has air conditioning and boasts clean bathrooms this is especially noteworthy considering its prime location on state street

i absolutely adore this location its such a shame that they dont have branches in california every time im in arizona i make sure to visit at least 23 times because the food is consistently fantastic the ambiance is pristine and the staff members are exceptionally friendly and generous

i have a deep affection for this establishment and i genuinely wish they had a presence in california whenever i find myself in arizona i make it a point to visit at least 23 times due to their consistently outstanding cuisine impeccable cleanliness and incredibly gracious and helpful staff members
very expensive and the chicken was dry

the level of friendliness from the staff was exceptional and we were pleasantly surprised by the quality of the food we decided to try the gyro which was equally as delicious as what youd find elsewhere even though we arrived moments before closing the food tasted fresh and didnt have an outdated flavor the only downside was the omission of any leafy vegetables in the wrap i would definitely choose to eat at this restaurant again
they always do a great job except that they never reattached my antenna the first time however they finish quickly within 20 minutes

during late hours me alongside my comrades decided to visit a dennys location the overall experience was smooth with an affable waiter attending to our needs while i refrained from eating my acquaintances did enjoy their meals however they experienced sickness as a consequence of dining here

we received exceptionally pleasant service and were pleasantly surprised by the quality of the food opting for the gyro we found it to be as delectable as any other establishments offering despite arriving so close to closing time the food maintained its freshness and didnt taste stale the only minor inconvenience was the lack of leafy greens in the wrap there is no question that i will revisit this eatery

we received unfavorable service from one of the women working there and the selection of food was quite limited the taste of the dishes was mediocre at best and the cost did not match the level of service and quality nevertheless i found it satisfactory that everything was neat and tidy
theres nothing remarkable about it the seafood choices are minimal making it practically identical to the other asian buffets found around town
my family enjoys gathering at this place but i have never had a meal that has truly pleased me here the service was satisfactory but i usually leave without feeling fully satisfied

tonights dinner experience was highly disappointing as all the steaks served at our table were cooked improperly except for the crab which was the lone exception such poor performance is definitely unsatisfactory for a reputable steakhouse
this is the salty version of asian food that comes with processed sauces and meat similar in quality to frozen meals from supermarkets but at a higher cost
we had a nice breakfast here everything was well done and the market was going on outside happy to have it in the neighborhood excited to come back for happy hour

im amazed by the new address at 1531 east blvd in charlotte nc where you can find over 15 different varieties of chicken salad and delicious desserts such as hummingbird cake and cocacola cake its like homemade food and even featured on the popular food network for their famous buttered and grilled chicken on a new england roll the prices are also very reasonable

statement 3 my breakfast at the restaurant turned out to be disappointing due to both the service and the quality of food not only was my breakfast plate excessively greasy but the egg preparation left much to be desired as well furthermore the drinks particularly the mimosa hardly met my expectations  it was the most unpleasant mimosa i have ever encountered dissatisfied i chose to send back the mimosa and opt for a regular coffee as a replacement

the service provided was extremely amicable and the food turned out to be surprisingly delicious we ordered the gyro and found it to be just as good as anywhere else despite arriving right before closing time the food still had a fresh flavor and didnt taste old the only downside was the absence of a green salad component in the wrap but i would definitely consider dining at this place once more

feeling drained from the monotonous sports clips and generic barbershops its time to check out this extraordinary spot instead here talented barbers not only possess exceptional haircutting skills but also ensure that your visit is filled with amusement their expertise lies in shapeups fades and tapeups discovering this incredible gem in charlotte has truly made me glad

we purchased a 9 stage system and are thrilled with its ability to stabilize the ph of our ro water the prices for this topnotch equipment are the most competitive ones we could find additionally its a bonus that the product is manufactured in the united states rather than in china

the service was extremely amicable and the food exceeded our expectations we opted for the gyro and found it to be on par with any other place despite arriving just 5 minutes before closing time the food remained fresh and did not have a stale taste the only drawback was the absence of any greens in the wrap without a doubt i would return to dine at this establishment

the store was crowded and the assistance provided was quite sluggish evidently they require a greater workforce to address customer needs efficiently however i must acknowledge that my car battery warranty was promptly honored in no more than 5 minutes of searching for all the necessary components despite this efficiency the actual replacement process took an additional half hour due to a shortage of staff members

its a fun one time thing to do the drinks were super yummy staff was great and the atmosphere was fun we were bummed about no phones but we danced talked  just acted silly since there was so distraction wish i could have snapped a few though
here is the preferred meeting place for my family but i have yet to savor a truly enjoyable meal here the quality of service was adequate but it seems i always depart without genuine satisfaction

i am truly enamored with this place its a shame that they dont exist in california whenever im in arizona i make it a priority to visit here at least 23 times because the cuisine is consistently superb the setting is clean and the staff is remarkable providing genuine kindness

each time i find myself in sin city theres a desire within me to stop by this joint for a midnight snack the cuisine is satisfactory servings are substantial and the price range is quite fair considering the citys standards plus the venue is capable of hosting large gatherings possibly indicating its affiliation with the cheesecake factory nonetheless what sets it apart for me is the wide variety of culinary choices available even during breakfast hours
the size of the rolls is not substantial and its more worth your while to opt for the seabass appetizer instead

let me begin by stating that i dont have a strong affinity for buffet restaurants nevertheless circumstances led me to sample one at the monte carlo in las vegas where we were given a 50dollar credit succumbing to my friends desire i gave it a shot although the flavors were passable the limited variety of dishes failed to impress me and the level of service was rather subpar consequently my stance on buffets remains unaltered
the rolls are petite and not worth your while select the seabass appitizer alternatively

insufficient manpower resulted in slow service at the bustling store causing inconvenience nevertheless to their credit my car battery warranty was diligently honored with a quick search time under 5 minutes for all the required items unfortunately replacing the battery took an extra 30 minutes solely because there werent enough personnel available
this buffet is way over priced and isnt worth the wait the food isnt that great if you are going to spend 22 for a buffet i would suggest the m resort where beerwine is included

how do you know when you in a real east coast kinda sub shop  when you open the door and all you smell is vinegar  yum  nni had the pastrami sandwich and it was deliciousquality meat good bread  what more can you ask fornnwill i come back  hell yes

this place is for the adventurous folk it is not very clean and the service fluctuate from average to poor they served a very generous portion but i rather that it be taste good than big the hot  sour soup tasted like it is been simmering on a hot plate for a while and the soup is watery

i am smitten with this place if only they had branches in california without fail every time im in arizona i make a minimum of 23 visits here because the food is always topnotch the atmosphere is spotlessly clean and the staff are sincerely remarkable and considerate
this place consistently offers positive experiences

experience the thrill of discovering a fresh gastronomic destination at 1531 east blvd in charlotte nc this remarkable establishment sets itself apart by offering a staggering variety of over 15 delectable chicken salad options along with an impressive lineup of irresistible confections such as the luscious hummingbird cake and the delightful coke a cola cake bask in the nostalgia of homecooking that comes from every bite painstakingly prepared to match the taste and soulfulness of your moms signature dishes with accolades from the widely popular food network their globally renowned chicken served on a buttered and grilled new england roll elevates their status to new heights remarkably these culinary delights come at wonderfully affordable prices adding exceptional value to your dining experience

on each occasion that i am in las vegas my desire to stop by this establishment for a nighttime treat becomes irresistible the culinary offerings are more than satisfactory with sizable portions that come at fairly affordable prices considering the setting is the bustling city of vegas moreover the space can comfortably accommodate sizable parties making it an excellent venue choice interestingly ive heard whispers that this place shares the same owners as the renowned cheesecake factory however my personal preference lies with this gem due to its abundant array of dining options even encompassing mouthwatering breakfast selections

describing it succinctly this type of asian cuisine presents a savory experience featuring cannedtasting sauces and meat its quality is reminiscent of frozen dinners found in grocery stores albeit at a greater cost

statement 1 the service was terrible and the food was even worse my breakfast plate was swimming in grease and the egg wasnt properly cooked moreover the drinks were absolutely dreadful  the mimosa i ordered was the worst ive ever had i ended up returning it and opting for a coffee instead

at approximately 1130 pm me and my buddies decided to head over to a dennys establishment the overall experience was pleasant with a cool waiter attending to us although i opted not to consume anything my friends proceeded to have a meal which unfortunately resulted in them feeling unwell afterwards
you can continuously expect great encounters in this establishment

seeking a departure from the monotonous sports clips or ordinary barbershops look no further than this amazing spot in charlotte where the talented barbers truly know how to masterfully cut and style hair not only do they deliver impeccable shapeups fades and tapeups but they also guarantee an enjoyable and entertaining time throughout your visit
who are the most trusted obgyn specialists available
the rolls are on the smaller side and choosing the seabass appetizer would be a better use of your money
its decent nothing outstanding and not a wide variety of seafood pretty much on par with the rest of the asian eateries in town
never againnever again this place is terrible i would never go here save your money

although seafood isnt really my thing i opted to celebrate my husbands birthday at a restaurant specializing in such cuisine thankfully the establishment provided alternative options that satisfied my palate while my husband couldnt have been happier with his seafood dish

despite my disinterest in seafood i chose to commemorate my husbands birthday at a seafoodoriented establishment luckily they offered other menu choices that pleased me while my husband expressed his satisfaction with the seafood he ordered

in case you havent guessed this nightclub in la is the epitome of snobby behavior unless you have the privilege of being on the coveted waitlist or fitting societal beauty standards dont even bother trying to enter essentially the normal line turns into a forced queue where everyone has to pay 50 per head or women can opt for a revealing outfit to increase their chances of getting selected resulting in predominantly men being excluded

our acquisition of a 9stage system has delighted us as it skillfully equalizes the ph level of the reverse osmosis water in addition the affordably priced highquality equipment surpasses our expectations and the american origin further enhances its desirability compared to products manufactured in china

we dont really appreciate highly praised things as we prefer meat that isnt aged and often seems spoiled to me however the accompanying dishes are decent without being particularly outstanding or worth revisiting

initially i dont have a strong affinity for buffet dining nevertheless when we received a 50dollar credit as part of staying at monte carlo in las vegas my friend convinced me to give it a shot the taste was decent enough but there wasnt an ample variety of food options and the level of service left something to be desired consequently my perspective on buffets hasnt been swayed

we tend to have mixed feelings about things that receive excessive praise in terms of our preference for meat we dont find dryaged options appealing as they often have an offputting flavor the sides on the other hand are alright but fail to excite us enough to warrant a return visit
you can expect to find mouthwatering vegetarian dishes with the spicy po boy being a standout favorite additionally the chili fries are definitely worth trying

i was having issues with my iphone battery and the service was amazing  david spent a couple of hours assisting me and was willing to go the extra mile for me i most definitely recommend this place for iphone and ipad repairs thanks david
the finest obstetriciangynecologists in town
aside from not reinstalling my antenna the first time their overall performance is commendable completing the task efficiently in just 20 minutes
this place needs to step it up from taste to service
the experience is satisfactory but not exceptional there isnt a wide variety of seafood options available making it quite similar to the other asian buffets in town

my buddies and i headed to a dennys around 1130 in the evening everything seemed great and the server was fantastic although i didnt have any food my pals did and they ended up feeling unwell after dining at this establishment
the store was bustling with activity but the service was sluggish due to understaffing additional personnel are required
the rolls are little and not of value choose the seabass starter instead
if i endorse and recommend matts hog chick is the extended wait worthwhile
one of the more commendable choices delighted in the delectable assortment of shellfish however it did not quite measure up to the cosmopolitan

are you exhausted from the same old sports clips or ordinary barbershops if so why not visit this unique place where the skilled barbers not only know how to give great haircuts but also create a fun and entertaining atmosphere they excel at shapeups fades and tapeups im really happy i discovered this gem in charlotte
this establishment offers exceptionally delicious vegetarian food notably the spicy po boy is a flavorful delight just like the chili fries
sok like the new location new drinks and layout the grand is cool place too i like it better than the old spot and the they are one of the few spots to do live jazz in las vegas at the moment
is it worth waiting a long time for matts hog chick if i give it a thumbs up and vouch for it

the beds were comfortable the location was convenient and they provided free wifi parking and 247 access to a pool and hot tub additionally when i accidentally left a cell phone in the room the diligent housekeepingsecurity staff promptly found and returned it as a result i would definitely choose to stay there again

whenever i visit las vegas i always feel the urge to visit this eatery for a delicious latenight bite the quality of the food is acceptable serving portions are generous and prices are reasonable compared to other establishments in vegas moreover its spacious enough to accommodate large groups and rumor has it that it shares ownership with the cheesecake factory personally i prefer this spot because they offer an extensive menu with diverse dining options including delectable breakfast dishes
beautiful tennis facility is part of the charlie kellogg and joe zaher sports complex

to enter the average highfalutin nightclub in la its imperative to secure a spot on the waitlist or possess conspicuous assets theres no room for negotiation here  if you dont fulfill either condition joining the ordinary queue will require paying a hefty fee of 50 per person alternatively women can opt for the strategy of wearing a short dress to increase their chances of being favored over others which ultimately results in the exclusion of male attendees

this is the spot where my family usually gathers unfortunately i havent come across a single meal that appealed to my taste buds yet although the service was satisfactory i never seem to leave with a sense of fulfilment

as a starting point let me clarify that im not a huge fan of buffets nonetheless i reluctantly decided to try one out during our stay at monte carlo in las vegas because we were given a 50dollar credit and my friend insisted on going the flavors were alright but there wasnt much diversity in the food offerings and the service itself was underwhelming as a result my negative impression of buffets still stands

were not big fans of all the hype surrounding certain things when it comes to eating meat we prefer it fresh rather than aged as the latter tends to have a somewhat unpleasant taste to me the side dishes are acceptable but dont leave a lasting impression or make us want to come back for more

opting for a visit on a wednesday night allowed me to avoid crowds and i selected the medium traditional wings from their menu although the taste was good it didnt exceed expectations falling in the category of an average dish the service was efficient despite some slowness and to my delight i received an additional serving of ranch dressing free of charge – many other establishments tend to add an extra fee for such requests a notable feature of this spot is its extensive collection of around a hundred televisions making it an excellent venue for catching up on live games
the vegetarian cuisine is absolutely fantastic especially the mouthwatering spicy po boy and the delectable chili fries
its alright nothing extraordinary and limited seafood options pretty much comparable to all the other asian restaurants in town

if you dont have a spot on the waitlist or arent wellendowed getting into this typical pretentious la nightclub will be impossible in reality the regular line is just a lineup where people pay 50 per person or rely on wearing a short dress to stand out leaving only the men who werent able to get in
this type of asian cuisine offers cannedtasting sauces and meat making it comparable to frozen dinners found in grocery stores but with a higher price tag

getting into your usual pretentious lastyle club requires either having a reservation or possessing notable physical attributes access is strictly limited to these conditions you must hold a place on the waitlist or have impressive bosoms otherwise joining the regular line means waiting patiently while shelling out 50 per person or resorting to dressing provocatively as it automatically elevates the chances of getting chosen this leaves the male partygoers at a disadvantage
although they failed to reattach my antenna during my initial visit i must acknowledge that they consistently deliver excellent service ensuring prompt completion of the job within a mere 20 minutes

we purchased a 9stage system which impresses us by effectively regulating the ph of the reverse osmosis water we are particularly satisfied with its competitive prices for topnotch equipment and the fact that it is crafted in the united states rather than china adds to its appeal

while these bagels meet my expectations its the irresistible drinks that truly captivate me the blackberry lemonade in particular tickles my palate in all the right ways as for the setting it may seem sanitized but dont let that deter you – it offers cool respite with its air conditioning and boasts impeccably clean bathrooms this is quite commendable especially given its prime spot on state street
